definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be fat, grow fat (Ar. dasima; whence also dasamun grease, fat; NH [[דִּשֵּׁן]] make fat, cf. NH [[דֶּשֶׁן]] fat)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[וְדָשֵׁן]] consec. De 31:20 (JE) fig. of Isr.'s prosperity.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[דִּשַּׁנְתָּ]] Ps 23:5; [[וְדִשְּׁנוּ]] consec. Nu 4:13; Impf.: [[יְדַשְּׁנֶה־סֶּֽלָה]] Ps 20:4 volunt. (cf. Ges:§ 48, 3 De; but perh. rd. sf. [[נֶהָ]]-, [[נׇהּ]]- v. Ki Gee:l. c.); 3 fs. [[תְּדַשֶּׁן־]] Pr 15:30; Inf. [[לְדַשְּׁנוֹ]] Ex 27:3—causat. make fat [[בשׁמן]] ´[[ד]] [[ראשׁי]] i.e. anoint, symbol of festivity and joy Ps 23:5; [[עָָחֶם]] ´[[ד]] Pr 15:30 of bodily effect of good news; [[עולה]] ´[[ד]] find a burnt-offering fat = acceptable Ps 20:4; elsewhere denom. fr. [[דֶּשֶׁן]] (fat ashes);—take away, clear away the fat ashes (acc. of altar cleared) Nu 4:13 (P), so [[סירות לְדַשְּׁנוֹ]] Ex 27:3 (P).

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Impf. [[יְדֻשָָּׁן]] Pr 28:25, Is 34:7; 3 fs. [[תְּדֻשָּׁן]] Pr 11:25, Pr 13:4—pass. of causat.

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: be made fat, of dust saturated [[מֵחַלֶב]] Is 34:7; fig. of prosperity of the liberal Pr 11:25, the diligent Pr 13:4, the trustful Pr 28:25.

definitions.title: Hothp.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[הֻדַּ֫שְׁנׇה]] (cf. O1:§ 271 Ges:§ 54. 3) Is 34:6, of Yahweh's sword:—it hath fattened itself [[מֵחֶלֶב]] (‖[[מָֽלְאָה דָּם ]]
